title: Computers in accounting
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, George Cass and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: Shows some of the ways in which computer technology is being used in accounting firms and examines the impact of this on small business. Some of the problems encountered by small business when installing a new computer system are discussed. Also looks at the training needed by young people seeking employment in the accounting profession.
